reviewText: Sorry to say who ever made this tape didn't do a very good job.  The audio fades in and out during the first half of the movie.

This movie is great!!!! My wife and I have been trying to think of the name of it for years. Now I find it was only made in VHF :( . They should seriously consider making it available in dvd (blu-ray). I for one would buy it in an instant!
Robert A. Maloney

Saw this movie back in 93' and died laughing through several scenes with Dennis Farina and Leo Rossi !!

Had not seen it since and again it was hilarious. Only regret is that it wasn't available in DVD.
great Actors! New York comedy with that California touch. Couldn't find the DVD so I purchased and am happy with VHS. Great service.

We're Talking Serious Money [VHS] This is not a well known movie, but it is very humorous. Dennis Farina is funny in his role as a bumbling small time criminal who can't seem to pull off any big money crimes.

if you thought the'in laws" with alan arkin and peter falk was your  brand of humor,if "king of comedy" with di niro did it for  you,than "serious money" is perfect..a dark comedy with  incredible karma between the actors...highly recommend
